name: Wandering Duelist Alpha 1.1
description:
The Wandering Duelist is a single-player, narrative-driven adventure game that tells a story of love, conflict and reckless actions. Youth is a crucial stage in life when events and experiences shape who we are today, and you will have to make a decision that affect your transition to adulthood. The story takes place on a small and lively planet, where its residents carry on their daily activities that often pose dangers and obstacles for the player to avoid while exploring the world and completing tasks.

Platforms: PC

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Sprint - SHIFT
Navigation Arrow - SPACE
Dialogue/Interact - Left Click/Space/Enter

Early Access. The game is not yet compete. Only Episode 1 is available at the moment. More content, fixes and stories are coming up! The full release is set for December 2022

Twitter @WDuelist
